articles.author: The Verge
articles.title: Here’s a bunch of bananas shit Trump said today about breaking up Google
articles.description: Former president Donald Trump threatened in an interview today that, if elected president, he would “do something” about Google, but he may not break it up.
articles.content: I think it is a threat. Frankly I think everything’s a threat. There’s nothing that’s not a threat. But sometimes you have to fight through these threats. Like, Google: I’m not a fan of Google. They treat me badly. But are you going to destroy the co... [575 chars]

articles.author: NBC News
articles.title: Harris attacks Trump for allegedly giving Putin Covid tests 'when Black people were dying every day by the hundreds'
articles.description: As she steps up her appeals to Black voters, Vice President Kamala Harris appeared on a popular Black radio program Tuesday, saying she is still open to slavery reparations and slamming former President Donald Trump for allegedly sending Covid tests to Russia “when Black people were dying” back home.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Harris Ramps Up Efforts to Reconnect with Black Voters Amid Criticism
articles.description: Democratic candidate Harris defends her prosecutorial past, pledges marijuana decriminalization, and police reform to regain Black male voters' support. Despite facing misinformation and challenges from Trump supporters, she emphasizes economic proposals. Interviewed by Charlamagne tha God, Harris also plans to appear on Fox News and Joe Rogan's podcast.
